summary: Deal will allow advertisers to buy Netflix ads programmatically through Yahoo DSP later this year . Yahoo joins existing partners including The Trade Desk, Google Display & Video 360, and Microsoft .

Inflation is cooling at a faster rate than expected, much to the relief of millions of consumers . Consumers were reeling under the fears that the nation’s economy could slip into a recession . The fears have been largely alleviated over the past month after the tariffs were temporarily paused . With the United States and China finally reaching a trade deal last week, investors’ confidence is finally rebounding .  Core CPI, which excludes the volatile food and energy components, rose 0.1% sequentially in May and 2.8% from the year-ago levels . Year over year, CPI increased 2.4%, which came in line with analysts’ expectations . Trump has been repeatedly calling for rate cuts to boost the economy .
